package.name: subiz
package.summary: Enhance customer interaction for your Magento shop with Subiz live chat
package.description:
Enhance customer interaction for your Magento shop with Subiz live chat

Subiz offers the fastest way to reach out to potential website visitor, respond directly and fulfil every single enquiry in real-time.
These entire customer interactions occur on a web-based live chat widget docked at the bottom of your Magento store.

Get started:

Step 1: After install Subiz extension, choose menu Subiz live chat on Magento Admin Panel >> Dashboard

Step 2: Register Subiz account and Login Subiz Dashboard >> Settings >> Installations >> Get License ID or Copy embed code

Step 3: On Magento Admin Panel, choose menu Subiz live chat >> Configuration >> Enter License ID or embed code in the appropriate fields >> Choose Yes in Enabled >> Save Config

Step 4: Return to Dashboard and start chatting with your visitors.

Key features:

Implementing Subiz into your Magento website, it will create an excellence customer service channel to make your shop outstanding among competitors.

  • IM chat app: Support for visitors on the go via IM client
  • Dashboard: Access to Subiz Dashboard integrated on your Admin Panel to know exactly who enters your site, understand what they are looking for and proactively monitor them with personal touch
  • Widget: Customize the widget to fit with your website: size, color, theme, avatar, font,...
  • Trigger: Proactively invite visitors for a chat based on predetermined rule of trigger
  • Safety of data: Store data in a secure servers for easy achievement
  • Report: Advanced analytic and report on operator activity with integrated Google Analytics
  • Canned response: Use canned responses and shortcut answer for fast and effective chat

For more details regarding feature and price, please visit here

Support

If you meet any difficulties installing or utilising Subiz, please drop us an email at support@subiz.com or chat with us
package.notes: First release of Subiz live chat extension for Magento Why Subiz: Understand your customers Monitors visitor in real-time Attractive customizable widget Support visitor on the go with IM app
